text: Yancya kahanyam (vrttanta) madhye bud'dhimanankarita niscitaca bodha ani tambi ahe. Ha kura'ana kahi khotya racalelya gosti nahi, kimbahuna he satya-samarthana ahe tya granthance je yacya purvice aheta, ani pratyeka gostice savistara varnana ani margadarsana va daya-krpa ahe imana rakhanaryankarita
